attributes.action: Designate Britain First as a proscribed terrorist organisation.
attributes.additional_details:
Demand that all social media sites are closed down entirely and if they are put up again, those responsible should be prosecuted.

Evidence of there hatred to Muslims was seen following US President Donald Trump's retweet of 3 anti Muslim videos posted by Deputy Leader Jayda Fransen. One of the videos was debunked as involving no Muslims or migrants, clearly they intended to raise tensions.

The UK Government condemned this action now they must take action to prevent further division and hatred.
attributes.background:
Britain First are an extremist offshoot of the BNP. Via the internet and social media the group spews out anti Muslim propaganda in order to fulfill their goal of an 'Holy War' against the Muslim community in the UK.

The UK Government must proscribe this group before they achieve their aims.
